question: Which state government has launched a mobile application called PRAGYAAM to issue e-passes for people involved in essential services amid lock-down?
explanation:
The state government of Jharkhand has launched a mobile application called ‘PRAGYAAM’ to issue e-passes to the people engaged in delivery of essential services during the national lockdown.
The country observes a 21-day nation-wide lockdown to combat the spread of coronavirus. After verifying and uploading the documents through this android-based application, the District Transport Officers will issue e-passes.
